feed.title: Food Court
feed.subtitle: A place to find all sorts of recipes in making your homemade delicious food.

entry.title: Hamburger
entry.summary: Ingredients A burger bun A fat burder patty Any kind of toppings Steps Start frying your patty in oil or butter Reduce the Heat as the patty starts to sizzle Put your burger buns in a toaster Wait until the patty is clearly cooked Retrieve the bun and the patty Put the patty on the bun and add any toppings you want

entry.title: Quickly Caramelized Onyo
entry.summary: Ingredients Vidalia Onyo Sugar Balsamic Vinegar Unsalted Butter Water Salt Pepper Steps Take Onyo Slice Onyo into very long and slim strips Put 1 Tbsp. of Butter into pan Turn heat on to Medium-High Put Onyo in the pan as soon as the butter melts Season with Salt ...

entry.title: Bacon & Eggs
entry.summary: Ingredients A loaf of your favorite bread Extra-large eggs, because you want a generous yolk. Your favorite bacon Steps Fry Your Bacon in a Skillet Reduce the Heat as the Bacon Starts to Sizzle Use Bacon Fat to Fry Your Eggs The Temperature of the Fat is Important Use Hearty Bread for Toast Baste Your Eggs with Bacon Fat ...
